name: Aspar GP Master
overview: Grand Prix Master is a viewed-from-above, motor cycle racing game in which you find yourself taking part in the 80cc World Motor Cycle Racing Championship. It's a game of points-tables, racetracks and bikes that look like tadpoles in which you get to play the Spanish Motorcyle Champion Jorge Martinez 'Aspar'. The aim of the game is to compete against the other motorcyclists inthe championship in an attempt to win it. So zip up your leathers, sit astride and prepare to race.
